nodes.text: Darth Vader's secretary was in reality a shapeshifting assassin who accompanied Darth Vader to Aargau, along with two other assassins, to kill Viscount Tardi. While the Viscount was visiting the Garden of Butterflies the shapeshifter changed into the form of a rare butterfly with a poisonous sting and set off to attack Tardi. However, Princess Leia Organa quickly observed that the butterfly was approaching Tardi and she ordered R2-D2 to spray it with fire retardant. This caused the butterfly to fall to the ground where Leia discreetly crushed it with her foot, killing the shapeshifter.
